phrases: Are you going to stay home again today?
Yeah, I still feel a little yucky.
I faked being sick to skip school...
I am in love with you, Hori-san.
Have been for a while now.
I do not know how to face Miyamura after that.
It used to be so easy to just text him, but now...
I cannot hang tomorrow, but I am free the day after!
Okay, you should come over then!
I Cannot Say It Out Loud
I Cannot Say It Out Loud
I Cannot Say It Out Loud
Oh, I saw my bro this morning!
He was walking with a girl.
Hey, which one do you want to eat?
This orange one has gummy balls in it!
You can have that; I do not like citrus.
She was wearing some other uniform.
Some other uniform equals some high-school girl?
And hanging out with her times I am in love with you equals he is cheating?
He is totally cheating on me, is not he?!
He is totally cheating on me, is not he?!
He is totally cheating on me, is not he?!
He is totally cheating on me, is not he?!
He is totally cheating on me, is not he?!
I am making too many assumptions.
She was practically wrapped around his arm!
Hey, do not make a mess!
I should just text him to see what really happened.
She could be a friend from middle school, like Shindo-kun.
It might not have even been...
Third Year Elective: Modern Japanese, Class A
He was real worried about you, Hori.
He is sitting over by the window.
Okay, everyone, please find a seat.
I did not see her in homeroom.
She was here for first period, but she was, like, really on edge.
Like in a really foul mood.
Almost seems like she does not want to talk to you.
Did you guys get into a fight or something?
We got to go to the other classroom, Miyamura.
Oh, sorry, go on without me.
I wanted to talk to you-
Sorry, I got to head home early today!
The other day, you were awake, right?
I said it because I knew you were awake, you know.
Th-The girl you were walking with.
Say that Souta had the wrong guy.
Say that Souta had the wrong guy.
Say it was just his imagination.
Say it is not like that, please!
Yeah, uh, she goes to Yasaka-
I have never heard you call a girl by her first name.
And she was hanging off of you in public, too.
I bet Chika-chan's smart if she is going to Yasaka...
You have got it all wrong!
Chika-chan and I are not like that!
Chika-chan slipped and twisted her ankle,
and then, so did Shindo, so I lent her an arm to lean on.
So it is not like Chika-chan is-
Chika-chan this, Chika-chan that, Chika-chan everything!
But I do not know her last name...
Wait, she is not mad about me walking with her...
She is mad about the name?
She is mad about the name?
That was all it took to make her this mad at me...
I threw a book right in his face.
You can have yogurt, you do not need to ask-
I mean, I will leave if you want.
I, uh, thought about just giving it to you tomorrow,
but you might need it for homework...
I am guessing it is still about Chika-chan...
He probably has no idea why I am mad at him...
Uh, sorry for throwing a book at you.
It is my fault for bringing up Ch-
Uh, Shindo's girlfriend, when it was making you upset.
Do you know Chika-chan's last name, or...
Sheesh, I wish you would told me sooner!
Then I would not have assumed wrong.
You just did not listen, Hori-san.
I mean, I said it because I knew you were awake, so yeah.
I was not expecting a response or anything.
Honestly, I was kind of scared to hear how you would respond.
Sorry for dropping that on you and running.
H-Hold on, why are you here?!
I am here to hang out.
Kyoko, big girls do not hit their daddies with an axe kick.
I come home for the first time forever, and Yuriko's not around,
my own daughter is beating me up, and she brought home a random guy!
Most people would call before showing up on our doorstep.
She will groan, but make something for me anyway.
S-Sorry, sir, I should have intro-
What the hell is going on?!
Kyoko... could you put it on the table next time?
Sorry, I have no idea where she gets this from.
Oh, no, I would not say she is violent...
You are an only kid, or you got siblings?
Man, I always wanted to say that!
You are kind of freaking me out here!
Umm, so Hori-san calls you by her first name?
Miyamura-kun, you know, my name's Hori-san, too.
Could you call my daughter by her name?
I will use her first name.
It would be totally awkward switching to her first name out of the blue!
I wish I were anywhere else right now.
What is the deal with you and Miyamura-kun?
Well, yeah, got a problem with that?!
-Watch out, it is going to fall!
-Hori-san... -Watch out, it is going to fall!
I do not like boys with long hair!
Have you looked in a mirror lately?
I will cut it short, sir.
Nah, you should just tie it back.
Would not want it to go to waste.
Kyoko-chan, get us some bobby pins!
The girls must be all over you, huh, Miyamura-kun?
So you are fine settling for Kyoko here?
She is the one I fell for.
I wish I could go back to high school.
You are exactly like Yuriko was way back when.
And I bet you have been this immature since then, too, you big, fat loser.
We will not have enough dinner for you!
Oh, it is okay, I will go home.
I guess you could borrow Miyamura's silverware.
We have some disposable chopsticks you could use...
I do not have chopsticks, either?!
Sorry about Kyosuke being super annoying.
Somehow, him being a Hori kind of justifies his behavior...
I do not know very much about you.
But I would like to learn more about you, little by little.
At least, I hope I can.
Now I know how hard it is to say see you tomorrow...
Yeah, so how many problems did we have to do for Math?
I was the one closest to her, man.
Maybe I will get a part-time job!
Then you should work at our place!
He looks kind of down today...
We should head to the student council room.
You were totally looking at something!
Let us just get to the council room.
Is it something you need to hide from me?
You have been acting weird lately.
What was that daze you were in just now?
If something is bothering you, I will listen!
She is got such big eyes
That is why Ishikawa-kun likes her.
You really think I cannot help you with it?
You are cute, and I am not, so you would not get what is bothering me.
I wish I were you, Remi.
Why is Ayasaki always hanging around Kono?
They are like, Beauty and the Beast!
I do not want to be Beauty.
There is a guy I like.
I am not cute like you, Remi.
I have never seen you blush before!
You know, you are always so calm and level-headed, but when you blush like this,
Why do you need me to come?
No, he just made me come with.
I was wondering about the English midterm.
How do I translate that one grammar form again?
Do not tell me you are feeling awkward.
I told you not to worry about it.
Do not make me repeat myself, moron.
They are in their own little world.
Whoa, what the hell is that answer?!
I am only good at -ing verbs.
Oh, someone was supposed to be here.
I do not mean you, Miyamura!
Here I thought you were going to start calling me by my first name.
Y-You know when you get all flustered, I am the one who gets embarrassed!
my name does not start with Dummy.
This Summer's Going to Be a Hot One
